title: Eli Lilly reports 9% rise in third-quarter profit
text:
Eli Lilly reports 9% rise in third-quarter profit

Stock Markets 16 minutes ago (Oct 23, 2019 06:37AM ET)

(Reuters) - Eli Lilly and Co (N: ) reported a 9.1% increase in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher sales of its top-selling diabetes drug, Trulicity, and lower tax expense. Net income rose to $1.25 billion, or $1.37 per share, in the quarter ended Sept. 30, from $1.15 billion, or $1.12 per share, a year earlier. Revenue rose 3.2% to $5.48 billion.

Eli Lilly reports 9% rise in third-quarter profit
description: Eli Lilly reports 9% rise in third-quarter profit
